Message.Name: Welcome
Message.Words: Mom and Dad are in a _fight with a lowly adventurer!

Message.Name: Help Text
Message.Words: At the top of the screen you will see a _box that will explain things _to you as you navigate!

Message.Name: Action
Message.Words: To perfom an action navigate _the menu to the left of the screen!

Message.Name: Abilities
Message.Words: Each character has a set of _8 unique abilities that you unlock _as you level up! _Each Ability draws from your _Battle Point Pool! _So be careful!

Message.Name: Items
Message.Words: You can use Items in you turn to _help your chances to survive. _Items can be found while you _adventure or can be bought from the shop!

Message.Name: Run
Message.Words: If you feel that you are not up to _complete a fight... you can select run _and attempt to escape!

Message.Name: Finish
Message.Words: Now finish this fight! _Ratsputin is probably wondering _where his parents are!
